actions.title: Standardise telemetry schema and redaction
actions.why: Telemetry is the bridge between what the app did and what the model should learn.
next_steps: Define an event schema for model interactions.
Implement telemetry→SFT and telemetry→retrieval pairs transforms.

actions.title: Isolate retrieval + chunking into a single library surface
actions.why: Stable chunking/embedding settings prevent offline vs runtime mismatch.
next_steps: Extract chunking rules into one module with golden tests.
Train embeddings/LLM2Vec with the same chunk distribution used at runtime.

actions.title: Make evaluation first-class (golden set + regression gates)
actions.why: Fine-tuning without a regression gate is just vibe-training.
next_steps: Create a golden eval suite: tool parsing, JSON validity, groundedness/citations, refusal correctness.
Add an offline eval CLI and a CI job that blocks regressions.
Version eval cases alongside prompt templates.

actions.title: Harden tool-calling boundaries and injection resistance
actions.why: Tool-calling is the highest-risk surface; harden and train for safe behaviour.
next_steps: Validate tool args against JSON schema before execution.
Add red-team eval set: injection, schema smuggling, exfil attempts.
